author: acmurthy
msg: HADOOP-2022.  Ensure that status information for successful tasks is correctly recorded at the JobTracker, so that, for example, one may view correct information via taskdetails.jsp. This bug was introduced by HADOOP-1874. Contributed by Amar Kamat.
